txt.en: 'Pay attention, maggot! You are nothing, a speck. I don't know why Mordirith sent you here, but perhaps you can help. Head out the front gate to the South and jump into the fray. Speak with Chief Guard Duthúrz out at the first camp-site. He will have work for you.\n\n'Get out of my face. You sicken me.'

'What are you doing here, recruit? You aren't ready to step foot out here! Why do they keep sending me fodder? I need trained soldiers. Get back in the camp and learn something before a Burglar stealth kills you!\n\n'Return to base now and speak with Uglash! Come back to me when you've learned a thing or two about fighting out here.'

'Pitiful fool.\n\n'You've passed the first test. You follow orders blindly even when it means certain death. Well done. Now let us see if you can learn more obvious thoughts like \qthe Orc with the bigger sword wins.\q'
Having entered the Ettenmoors as an Orc, you need to learn your way around. Follow your orders and do not get yourself killed by the Free Peoples who lurk around every corner.
Get your orders from Chief Guard Duthúrz
Soldier Gazfríb has ordered you to get into the fight already. He wants you to go speak with Chief Guard Duthúrz outside the gate to the south. Leave the camp and speak with him immediately.
Return to safety and speak with Uglash
You are deemed unworthy by the Chief Guard. Speak with Uglash inside the base to learn more about what you need to survive the Moors.
